title: Day 2: $100 Savings Challenge (a confession and does this disqualify me from today??)
description: Okay, confession time… It’s Day 2 of the $100 Savings Challenge and I accidentally didn’t look ahead to what today’s challenge was — until this morning! Oops! Word to the wise: always plan ahead! More on that below. But first, if you haven’t signed up for the $100 Savings Challenge, be sure follow the directionsRead More
author: Crystal Paine
